Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoSure Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoSure Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a home-use self-testing system for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm by people with diabetes at home for self-testing as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates.
